about:
Information Systems Engineer with experience in data analysis, software development, and teamwork. I have acquired and perfected these skills through solid academic training and a variety of personal and professional projects.

I stand out for being a responsible, committed, and persevering person, always looking for new challenges and learning opportunities to continue growing both technically and professionally.

experience.description:
Architecture migration: Transition from a monolithic Python Flask application to a modern architecture based on a backend API developed with Flask and a PWA frontend developed with React.js. Improving the scalability, robustness, and maintainability of the project.

Continuous development and maintenance: Continuous development and maintenance of new features for the Trini Talkbot project, specializing in the creation and management of chatbots. This includes, among others, the real-time chat system, the creation of an interactive analytics dashboard for key data visualization, the connectors section to integrate with various services, and the campaigns section to send multiple messages to different contacts.

Implementation of automated tests: Creation of an automated testing system, improving code quality.

Design and UI/UX: Design and layout of the user interface, improving the usability and overall aesthetics of the application.
